items.text: length, flatter and angled in, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Munro, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, Munro comes down the wicket and drills it to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Munro, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, bit of turn, pushed to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: straighter one, full on middle, Williamson was shaping to go leg side, adjusted and defended with a straight bat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: length on middle, Munro opens the face and runs it to point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Munro, no run

items.text: short outside off, Munro backs away and blasts it towards cover, but Mashrafe makes an excellent diving stop to his right
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Munro, no run

items.text: length around leg, Munro tries to lap it behind but can't beat short fine
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Munro, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, pushed to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Munro, 1 run

items.text: length, angled in, whipped away to deep square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: Has he got him? Bangladesh celebrate and Munro walks. Shakib's the man for Bangladesh again. It was full around middle and leg, Munro went for the slog sweep but couldn't get under it and thereby didn't have the elevation to clear midwicket, who took an excellent catch diving forward
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Munro, OUT

dismissal.text: C Munro c Mehidy Hasan Miraz b Shakib Al Hasan 24 (41m 34b 3x4 1x6) SR: 70.58

items.preText: Atiq: "That'll help Shakibs one-on-one record with Munro :)"
items.text: length on off, Williamson stays back and defends
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williamson, no run

items.text: length on middle, an off cutter that grips off the surface and kicks at Williamson a little, but he controls the nudge to the leg side well
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williamson, no run

items.text: length outside off, Williamson stands tall and punches it to mid-off's left for one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: length and targeting Taylor's front pad, he plants it across but manages to get his bat around and push it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: full outside off and off the mark in grand style, driven crisply through cover-point and into the boundary in a flash
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off, comes forward defends to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: length outside off, held it back a little, Williamson presses forward, then goes back and pushes it to deep cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: Have they got Williamson through a run-out? He's well short but it also looks like Mushfiqur knocked the bails off before the throw came in? He was miles short there, having responded slowly to Taylor's call after he pushed the ball to mid-on, probably did not expect the throw at his end, and should have been back in the hut but that's a terrible, terrible miss. Whats more, the throw was headed for the middle stump, had Mushfiqur not been so eager to collect it in front of the stumps
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, 1 run
Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: down the wicket and hammered back, Shakib flicks it back to the stumps, but Williamson is alert to the danger and gets his bat back in time
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: comes down the wicket and lifts it over midwicket to calm the nerves
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: what an over this has been, nearly drags one on! Came down the track to repeat the previous stroke, it was pushed wider of off, Taylor swung anyway and only managed an inside edge that nearly rolled back on to the stumps
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: short on middle, pulled to deep square leg for one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, nudged to the leg side for a quick run
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: short outside off, Williamson cuts but can't beat point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williamson, no run
